summary: The diff clearly adds an admin-only menu item labeled "Profile Management" that links to /admin with a search param tab=profiles in AppShell.tsx. However, because AppShell.tsx is truncated before the active-route logic and before the rendered desktop/mobile menus, the diff summary does not provide enough evidence to confirm that active highlighting works specifically for /admin?tab=profiles or that the entry appears in both desktop navigation and the mobile sheet menu.

missing_requirements.requirement: The "Profile Management" entry must appear in both the desktop navigation and the mobile sheet menu.
missing_requirements.reason: AppShell.tsx is truncated and does not show the JSX that renders desktop navigation and the mobile Sheet menu items, so presence in both menus cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Active-route highlighting must work when the current URL is /admin?tab=profiles (the "Profile Management" entry is visually indicated as active).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows an isActiveRoute helper starting but it is truncated before any query-parameter comparison logic is visible; therefore, correct active-state handling for tab=profiles cannot be confirmed.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to frontend-file-summaries.txt describing many unrelated code changes across numerous files (e.g., App.tsx loading gate removal, multiple hooks/pages changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to add an admin-only "Profile Management" navigation entry in AppShell.tsx; modifying/adding broad project summaries (and especially claiming unrelated behavioral changes) was not requested.
BuildRequest did not request changes to project state metadata; only the navigation entry in AppShell.tsx was in scope.
